title: The abridgemente of goddes statutes in myter, set oute by Wylliam Samuel seruaunt to the Duke of Somerset hys grace
author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.
publisher: By Robert Crowley [i.e. R. Grafton] for Robert Soughton [i.e. Stoughton] dwellynge at the signe of ye bishops miter wythin Ludgate,
notes: A verse abridgment of the Pentateuch.
Identified as STC 21960+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
